filter.name: my-open
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (OPEN, Reopened) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: my-todo
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('To Do') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: my-ongoing
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('In Progress') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: my-resolved
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (Resolved, 'In Code Review', Verified) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: my-openlinux
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('Merge To Openlinux') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: my-closed
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (Closed) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: my-weekly
filter.pattern: assignee in (JIRAASSIGNEE) AND labels in (Security-TEE-JIRALABELDATE, Security-DVB-JIRALABELDATE, Security-Crypto-JIRALABELDATE, Security-CAS-Certification-JIRALABELDATE, Security-CAS-Integration-JIRALABELDATE,Security-CAS-Production-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: security-open
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(security)) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (OPEN, Reopened) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: security-todo
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(security)) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('To Do') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: security-ongoing
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(security)) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('In Progress') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: security-resolved
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(security)) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (Resolved, 'In Code Review') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: platform-pmlist-open
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(jira-sw-platform)) AND project not in (RSP, SWPL) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (OPEN, Reopened) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: platform-pmlist-todo
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(jira-sw-platform)) AND project not in (RSP, SWPL) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('To Do') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: platform-pmlist-ongoing
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(jira-sw-platform)) AND project not in (RSP, SWPL) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('In Progress', 'In Code Review') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: platform-reflist-open
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(jira-sw-platform)) AND project in (RSP, SWPL) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('To Do') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: platform-reflist-todo
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(jira-sw-platform)) AND project in (RSP, SWPL) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in (OPEN, Reopened) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: platform-reflist-ongoing
filter.pattern: assignee in (membersOf(jira-sw-platform)) AND project in (RSP, SWPL) AND priority in (Highest, High, Medium) AND status in ('In Progress', 'In Code Review') ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: security-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-TEE-JIRALABELDATE, Security-DVB-JIRALABELDATE, Security-Crypto-JIRALABELDATE, Security-CAS-Certification-JIRALABELDATE, Security-CAS-Integration-JIRALABELDATE,Security-CAS-Production-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: tee-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-TEE-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: dvb-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-DVB-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: crypto-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-Crypto-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: cas-certification-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-CAS-Certification-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: cas-integration-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-CAS-Integration-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC

filter.name: cas-production-weekly
filter.pattern: labels in (Security-CAS-Production-JIRALABELDATE) ORDER BY priority DESC, status ASC, assignee ASC
